scripts.android: cp -f config/production.json jsbundles/runtime.json && node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file jsbundles/salary.js --bundle-output output/android/salary.jsbundle --assets-dest output/android/ && cp -f config/local.json jsbundles/runtime.json
scripts.ios: cp -f config/production.json jsbundles/runtime.json &&  node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file jsbundles/salary.js --bundle-output output/ios/salary.jsbundle --assets-dest output/ios/ && cp -f config/local.json jsbundles/runtime.json
